message.raw:
Added the capability to load/save runmanager state.

Just use the entries located in the File menu!
Will remove the "load runmanager defaults" code Russ wrote from the labconfig file (and associated runmanager code) and make runmanager automatically save/load state on exit/start. Users will also be able to save/load their own configurations independently of this.

Also need to save/load the state of:
* Sort order of globals for each group
* Sort order of files loaded in the "Group" tab
* column sizes for all treeviews

refs #451
